Let $a_1, a_2, \cdots$, be a sequence with the following properties.\\
\\
I. $a_1 = 1$, and\\
II. $a_{2n}=n\cdot a_n$ for any positive integer $n$.\\
\\
What is the value of $a_{2^{100}}$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\; 1\qquad
\textbf{(B)}\; 2^{99}\qquad
\textbf{(C)}\; 2^{100}\qquad
\textbf{(D)}\; 2^{4950}\qquad
\textbf{(E)}\; 2^{9999} $
